question: Radhika got 16th rank from the top and 13th rank from the bottom in an exam. How many students are there in the class?
In a row of people, Ram is 18th from the left and 23rd from the right. How many people are there in the row?
In a row of trees, the lemon tree is 13th from either end. How many trees are there in the row?
In the row of people, A is 13th from the left and 19th from the right. How many people are there in that row?
There are 47 cars in a row. The black car is 18th from the right end and the white car is 39th from the right end. How many cars are there between the black and white cars?

6 persons P, Q, R, S, T, U are sitting in a straight line facing north but not in the same order. Two persons are sitting between P and T. S is sitting to the immediate right of P. R is at the extreme right. Q is sitting second to the left of P. U is sitting between Q and P. Who is sitting at the extreme left?

In a class, X is ranked seventh from the top and Y is ranked sixteenth from the bottom. If they interchange their positions, then X becomes twenty-first from the top. What will be the position of Y from the bottom now?

'A + B' means 'A is the father of B'; 'A - B' means 'A is the sister of B'; 'A × B' means 'A is the brother of B'; 'A + B' means 'A is the daughter of B'. If, R + S ×T – V+ U, then how is S related to U?

Siddharth and Murali started jogging from the same point. Siddharth walked 4 km towards east. Murali went 3 km towards west. Siddharth turned left and walked 4 km. Murali turned right and walked 4 km. What is the distance between Siddharth and Murali now?
'D' is father of B, 'B' is sister-in-law of 'C' and daughter of 'A'. How is 'A' related to 'D'?
If A is the mother of D, B is not the son of C, C is the father of D, D is the sister of B, then how is A related to B?
In a certain code language, ‘TORCH’ is written as 'UNPSDI' and 'BEST' is written as 'CDFTU', then how will 'MARKS' be written in the same code language?
If 18 October, 2006 was Wednesday, then what was the day of the week on 17 October, 2000?
